entry.title: Sybil and I met up with our friend Lai Yong and her friends from Bhutan this morning, Tshering Tashi and his wife Dechen . We spoke about how mindfulness and meditation can bring about a more peaceful world. ‚ù§Ô∏è

entry.title: Spent Sunday with my old friends and some new ones I made over the past 2 months. We had lunch together savouring traditional Malay food with a modern spin by the passionate chef. The mee siam was a hit amongst us Montfort boys ‚Äî it took us back to our fa
entry.content: Spent Sunday with my old friends and some new ones I made over the past 2 months. We had lunch together savouring traditional Malay food with a modern spin by the passionate chef. The mee siam was a hit amongst us Montfort boys ‚Äî it took us back to our favourite mee siam stall in school! Thankful for the time and attention all of these amazing folks gave me during the past few weeks.

entry.title: We spend our lives chasing money, power or control thinking that they result in more happiness. However, true happiness comes from searching within ourselves. I learned that much later in my life when I started looking for answers. #adulting #lifehacks #m
entry.content: We spend our lives chasing money, power or control thinking that they result in more happiness. However, true happiness comes from searching within ourselves. I learned that much later in my life when I started looking for answers. #adulting #lifehacks #moneytips #wellnesstips #lifetips

entry.title: Many of you have asked how to meditate . I hope you will find this short guide useful. What are some questions you have about meditation? ##adulting #lifehacks #wellnesstips #meditation #mentalhealth

entry.title: Dear friends, it has come to my attention that some accounts have resorted to using deepfakes of me or Sybil to sell financial products/services. Sybil & and I will only communicate with you via our personal and verified channels. Unless otherwise stated
entry.content: Dear friends, it has come to my attention that some accounts have resorted to using deepfakes of me or Sybil to sell financial products/services. Sybil & and I will only communicate with you via our personal and verified channels. Unless otherwise stated with our approval, we will not reach out to you or propagate messaging through other channels. Please be vigilant and double-check before engaging with such accounts. We have managed to get most of the videos taken down, except for one platform. We will continue to do our best to ensure they are removed so that our online community is kept safe. Let us all play our parts in ensuring our own financial and digital defence. Do share this message with your family and friends. Have a good weekend!

entry.title: Had a great game with my friends early morning, despite the heat. Staying fit helps us embrace ageing ‚Äî You‚Äôre never too old to live your best life! What is your favourite way to get your weekly dose of exercise? #fitness #fitnessmotivation #healthy #well

entry.title: I have learned we must search for peace within ourselves, all the great religions teach us this. Meditation helped me look past the illusion of power and control. Going within ourselves, helps us see our oneness. #mentalhealth #peace #lifelessons #meditat
entry.content: I have learned we must search for peace within ourselves, all the great religions teach us this. Meditation helped me look past the illusion of power and control. Going within ourselves, helps us see our oneness. #mentalhealth #peace #lifelessons #meditation #lifehacks

entry.title: Meditation helped me and my late wife when she was dying of cancer to stay calm and peaceful in the face of extreme stress. While undergoing treatment, she remained cheerful in her final days. Our 15 year practice of meditation prepared us to be at peace
entry.content: Meditation helped me and my late wife when she was dying of cancer to stay calm and peaceful in the face of extreme stress. While undergoing treatment, she remained cheerful in her final days. Our 15 year practice of meditation prepared us to be at peace in the face of difficulty and extreme adversity. After her passing, meditation helped me cope with my sadness. #mentalhealth #peace #lifelessons #cancer #cancerawareness

entry.content: Sybil made us one of her childhood favourites today ‚Äî Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich! Even though I told her the taste was ‚Äòok‚Äô, I was smiling widely. I am blessed to be able to share these moments with her. This is a reminder to tell your loved ones you appreciate them ‚ù§Ô∏è #breakfast #family #couplegoals #couple #peanutbutter
